title: Bryan Carter at JALC
description: From the timeless sophistication of Billy Strayhorn to the lively energy of Shania Twain, 2024 Grammy and Tony Award winner Bryan Carter leads the 35-piece Jazz at Pride Orchestra in a spirited tribute to Bayard Rustin. Featuring vocalists Vuyo Sotashe, J. Hoard, Shenel Johns, and Georgia Heers, the evening offers a vibrant mix of genres, culminating in the world premiere of Carterâ€™s jazz oratorio, Rustin in Renaissance.
address: Frederick P. Rose Hall, Jazz at Lincoln Center
